message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. Considering its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500.

I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I was thinking of a lower price. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value and the price you mentioned earlier.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counter-offer. However, $11,000 is a significant drop from my initial price.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $12,500. I'm confident this price reflects the true value of the product.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I understand your concerns, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11,750. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
